ARETT: Augmented Reality Eye Tracking Toolkit for Head Mounted Displays

result.original_header: ARETT: Augmented Reality Eye Tracking Toolkit for Head Mounted Displays
result.value: This is a toolkit for Unity 3D which contains scripts for acquiring eye tracking data on the Microsoft HoloLens 2.
An accompaning package for analysis of the acquired data using R can be found in the [ARETT R Package](https://github.com/AR-Eye-Tracking-Toolkit/ARETT-R-Package) repository.

parent_header: ARETT: Augmented Reality Eye Tracking Toolkit for Head Mounted Displays
result.value: Documentation about the usage of the toolkit can be found in the [projects wiki](https://github.com/AR-Eye-Tracking-Toolkit/ARETT/wiki). Background information is provided in the [associated publication](#reference).

result.description:
This version updates ARETT to be compatible with Unity 2021.3.2f1.

For a changelog see the corresponding pull request: https://github.com/AR-Eye-Tracking-Toolkit/ARETT/pull/15
result.name: Version 2

result.description:
### Changelog:

* Added button to the web interface to run calibration on HL2 ([details](https://github.com/AR-Eye-Tracking-Toolkit/ARETT/wiki/Control-Interface#launch-et-calibration))
* Added API and calibration information to the recording information file
* Added additional multithread locks to try to prevent multithread issues
result.name: Version 1.1.0

result.description: This is the original version of ARETT, as described in the publication.
result.name: First Release

parent_header: ARETT: Augmented Reality Eye Tracking Toolkit for Head Mounted Displays
result.value: The toolkit is currently being developed for [Unity](https://unity.com/releases/2021-lts) [2021.3.2f1](https://unity3d.com/unity/whats-new/2021.3.2) and the [Microsoft Mixed Reality Toolkit](https://github.com/microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity) [v2.8.3](https://github.com/microsoft/MixedRealityToolkit-Unity/releases/tag/v2.8.3). However, it should work with all releases of the Unity 2021.3 LTS branch and future releases of Mixed Reality Toolkit. Compatibility with future versions of Unity is likely but not guranteed.

parent_header: ARETT: Augmented Reality Eye Tracking Toolkit for Head Mounted Displays
result.value: The latest Unity 2019-compatible version is [ARETT v1.1.0](https://github.com/AR-Eye-Tracking-Toolkit/ARETT/releases/tag/v1.1.0). This is also the original version documented in the publication.

parent_header: ARETT: Augmented Reality Eye Tracking Toolkit for Head Mounted Displays
result.value: A sample application integrating the toolkit into Unity project can be found in the [ARETT Demo](https://github.com/AR-Eye-Tracking-Toolkit/ARETT-Demo) repository.
